thumb.title: ''ｲｸﾞｱﾉﾄﾞﾝ(Iguanodon)'' MPPM 2025/6/6 2.0-5 @slowhand
thumb.description: "MPPM" gt./ba. duo。 影響の即効を求め、互いのｴﾌｪｸﾀに互いの音を入れ合い互いのｱﾝﾌﾟから出力し、故意も過失も意外も巻き込む配線を構築するに至った。現場で発振した音だけを使い、session cue を直接のやり取りし、その歌の浮沈を通じて感覚の鋭くなる体験を提出いたします。 "MPPM" gt./ba. duo. In search of an immediate effect, we put each other's sound into each other's effector and output it from each other's amp./speaker, and reached to constructing a wiring that involved both intentionally and accidentally, and unexpected treasure. Using only the sounds generated on stage, we exchange session cues directly and present an experience that will sharpen your senses through the floats and disappears of melodies. (Instagram account) https://www.instagram.com/akatishfrag/profilecard/?igsh=MTh1ZTM1eHUwNG1kMw== #MPPM #jazz #duo #improvisation #akatishfrag #tish #frag #art #music #japan #音楽 #日本 #演奏 #即興 #iguanodon #ｲｸﾞｱﾉﾄﾞﾝ
